Topic.Title: I Bet HE Is Working Hard To Make Sure Romney "Won't Build That". And Knowing HIM And HIS Powers, Romney Won't Build That.

Message.Msg: The Men that Built America I didn't see Obama listed with the greats like: Cornelius Vanderbilt, John D. Rockefeller, Andrew Carnegie, J.P. Morgan, & Henry Ford. My Grandkids can watch: The Men who Destroyed America Barrack Obama ~ Ben Bernanke ~ The Democratic party

Message.Title: "Gold Can Turn Pennies Into Dollars" - BONZ - Breakout Alert!!!
Message.Msg: Penny gold mining stocks can return tremendous profits as the price of gold moves higher. Bonanza Goldfields, BONZ, is one stock to invest in here. The company's new C.E.O. was a director at the U.S. Mint. Gold production is expected to begin soon at the company's Tarantula site. The news should move the share price to the .25 range. Read the recent Yahoo news. "Penny stock today. Dollar stock tomorrow."
